Marketing automation is a software solution that allows businesses to efficiently target its customers leveraging automated marketing campaigns across various channels, including emails, social media, websites and chat messengers. What are the benefits of marketing automation? Marketing automation helps businesses use automated software to carry out marketing campaigns with greater efficiency, reduced human effort, reduced errors, hyper-personalized targeting, cost-effectiveness, and enhanced customer experience. What is to be kept in mind while comparing marketing automation systems? The focus of any good automation solution must be on three things, cross-chennel promotions, emailing, and reporting. These three pillars of digital marketing automation includes social media management and monitoring, landing page creation, website personalization, email list segmentation, automated emails for cart abandonment, renewals, welcome emails, etc., testing abilities, website tracking, detailed analytics, and cross-channel reports.
